elements.text:
Your friend convinces you to go on a walk through a local park. You have heard that there are poisonous snakes in that park.

Here are some feelings that might happen in the moment:

texts: I'm anxious about getting bitten, but remind myself that's the worst case scenario and it probably won't happen.
I'm happy my friend asked me to go on a walk.
I'm worried about what we'll see in the park, but know that I can handle feeling a little worried.
I'm terrified that something bad is going to happen to me.
I'm calm thinking about going to the park.
